Its a good shooter with a "decent" community. Its a little tough to pick up everything right off the bat whether it be callouts, spread patterns, map knowledge, etc.. but once you get all of that down it starts to get fun.

This game is horrible but you know deep down you love it. Server issues are great and being CSGO'd is just another bullet in the chamber as to how much this game sucks. The Cache rework was broken DAY 1! Its all good tho because we still all love this game. Skins are stupid but guess what. We still all love the game. Don't buy it, buy it, do whatever the hell you want. Its bad but its the best thing that will ever happen to you.

Игра сама крутая, но читеров настолько много, что каждую игру вы играете либо с читерами в команде либо против читеров. И если раньше было 1-2 читера то сейчас по 3-4-5 читаков в одной игре. Лучше сразу играть на фейсит.
